ygData.subject: SPOILER for Beld
ygData.msgSnippet: ... still ... If you re level 30, then you should be looking forward to a Dark Reaver, Mr. Beld. Weapon: Dark Reaver Skill: 2H Slashing Delay: 42 Damage: 20
ygData.messageBody:
> er, i see a lvl 22 with a GZ and a 28 with a BIBS. i'm now lvl 30 and
still
> have a BBC.. ummmmmm anybody have a handout for ol' uncle beld? ;p

If you're level 30, then you should be looking forward to a Dark Reaver, Mr.
Beld.

Weapon: Dark Reaver
Skill: 2H Slashing
Delay: 42
Damage: 20
Weight: 9.5
Effect: Randomly casts Steal Strength spell (powered up version of Siphon
Str)

Location: Lower Guk
Mob to loot: Cavalier (lvl 35-40)

I'm sure you can round up some people in Cazic to go with you to Lower Guk.

Good luck!
Dravith (13)
